Issue.creator: rennman
Issue.summary: fabric-ca serialnumber for CSR not documented
Issue.description: , ... The cfssl implementation violates the syntax of the the ASN.1 definition, since the printable string's 'ub-serial-number' restricts the length from 1-64. cfssl apparently has no upper limit for this field as I was able to stuff well over 8K chars into the cert. This is apparently raises a separate issue since we should restrict the DN's length to a reasonable value. I'll open a separate defect for that. >
